values: Well maintained, freshly painted 2-Family centrally located near bus lines, highways, colleges & restaurants.  Original details, built-ins, french doors & gleaming hardwoods throughout.  Tons of storage in basement & walk-up attic, washer dryer hookups in basement.  Updates include new windows (basement to attic) within 3 years, new roof 2017, gas HW heaters, gas stove & dishwasher in unit 1, back porch recently rebuilt.  Garage sold 'as is' & used by tenants upon request.  Agent related to seller
Washington Avenue West to Homestead on Left, house on right
